original: Please go away!

original: You have to accept your role.
translated: Tu dois accepter ton rôle.

original: Which college are you aiming for?

original: The cattle starved to death.
translated: Le bétail est mort de faim.

original: I had soon given up all hope.
translated: J'avais vite abandonné tout espoir.

original: I'm normal.
translated: Je suis normal.

original: Grab my hand.

original: Tom has been called away on business.

original: He goes to school by bicycle.
translated: Il va à l'école à bicyclette.

original: No one will remember your own memories.

original: Answer the phone.
translated: Réponds au téléphone.

original: I feel like a fool.
translated: Je me sens comme un idiot.

original: I hadn't seen him in years.
translated: Je ne l’avais pas vu depuis des années.

original: The troops were annihilated.
translated: Les troupes furent anéanties.

original: Our goat gave birth to a litter of three kids.
translated: Notre chèvre a donné naissance à une portée de trois chevreaux.

original: Today I will not get an email from Mary.
translated: Aujourd'hui, je ne recevrai pas de courriel de Marie.

original: I planted various fruit trees on my property three years ago.
translated: J'ai planté divers arbres fruitiers dans ma propriété il y a trois ans.

original: It cost me three hundred dollars to have my car repaired.
translated: Ça m'a coûté trois cents dollars pour réparer ma voiture.

original: The leaves on the trees have turned red.
translated: Les feuilles sur les arbres ont viré au rouge.

original: I was hurt by many people.
translated: J'ai été blessé par de nombreuses personnes.

original: Has that information been proven?

original: The Algerian army has raped Kabyle women.
translated: L'armée algérienne a violé des femmes kabyles.

original: I considered changing my job, but in the end I decided not to.
translated: J'ai envisagé de changer de travail, mais au final j'ai décidé de ne pas le faire.

original: There used to be a church here.
translated: Avant, il y avait une église ici.

original: I'll keep it with me.
translated: Je vais la garder avec moi.

original: It's like Christmas all year around here.
translated: On dirait que c'est Noël toute l'année par ici.

original: Humans are conscious beings.
translated: Les humains sont des êtres conscients.

original: Are you a baker?
translated: Es-tu boulanger ?

original: I know that I'm a burden; you don't need to be repeating it.
translated: Je sais que je suis un fardeau ; inutile de le répéter.

original: Translate instead of chattering!
translated: Traduis, au lieu de bavasser !

original: Do not lie to Tom.

original: We have to give them something.

original: Come back!

original: I like writing with a fountain pen.
translated: J'aime écrire au stylo-plume.

original: My teacher has a weird name.
translated: Mon professeur a un nom bizarre.

original: Why don't you tell me what happened last night?
translated: Pourquoi ne me dites-vous pas ce qui s'est passé hier soir ?

original: Is there anything you don't know?
translated: Y a-t-il quelque chose que vous ignoriez ?

original: There used to be a hotel around here.
translated: Il y avait un hôtel dans les environs.

original: I deserve happiness.
translated: Je mérite le bonheur.

original: Jupiter is the largest planet in the Solar System.
translated: Jupiter est la plus grosse planète du système solaire.

original: Can you tell silver and tin apart?

original: Aren't you supposed to be at work?

original: This book costs 3,000 yen.

original: In this forest, at every step, we may face the most terrible perils that you can ever imagine. So let's go ahead.
translated: Dans cette forêt, à chaque pas, nous pouvons être confrontés aux périls les plus terribles que tu puisses imaginer. Alors, allons-y.

original: Tom sat next to us.
translated: Tom s'est assis à côté de nous.

original: I've bought a car.
translated: J'ai acheté une voiture.

original: Just be glad you're OK.
translated: Contente-toi juste d'être saine et sauve.

original: She called him to say that she'd be late.
translated: Elle l'appela pour lui dire qu'elle serait en retard.

original: Did you see that video where President Obama kills a fly with his bare hands?
translated: As-tu vu cette vidéo où le président Obama tue une mouche à mains nues ?

original: They like seafood.
translated: Elles aiment les fruits de mer.

original: The current college works by presidential fiat.
translated: Le collège actuel fonctionne par décret présidentiel.

original: Tom took part in a promotional event.
translated: Tom a participé à un événement promotionnel.

original: I don't have a chain saw, but I know someone who does.

original: She'll try it once more.

original: I think it's time for me to do my homework.

original: That's a good picture of you.

original: Could we take you somewhere else?
translated: Pourrions-nous t'emmener ailleurs ?

original: Our guests have arrived.
translated: Nos invités sont arrivés.

original: Goodbye, I'll see you at the time we agreed on.
translated: Au revoir. Je vous verrai à l'heure convenue.

original: It cost me a bundle.
translated: Ça m'a coûté un max.

original: No matter who says so, I can't believe that.
translated: Peu importe qui dit ça, je ne peux pas y croire.

original: We can go to the museum.
translated: Nous pouvons aller au musée.

original: Stop drinking. You're addicted.
translated: Arrêtez de boire ! Vous êtes dépendante !

original: She has to stop smoking.

translated: Il s'est suicidé par ingestion de poison.

original: Don't breathe a word of what I've told you to anyone.

original: Do you remember it?

original: They've taken a day off.

original: The trouble is that my son does not want to go to school.

original: I thought it was unnecessary for us to do anything about that today.
translated: Je pensais qu'il était pour nous inutile de faire quoi que ce fut à ce sujet, aujourd'hui.

original: Why are they laughing?

original: Tom didn't want my help.

original: He's afraid that he might be late.

original: "How are you feeling?" "Not good at all!"

original: Is this your pen?

original: I was told to come here today.

original: Tom likes to listen to music while he's doing his homework.

original: Can you help her out before they get her?

original: They're all here.

original: Tom accidentally shot himself in the foot while cleaning his gun.
translated: Tom s'est tiré dans le pied pendant qu'il nettoyait son arme à feux.

original: I'll let you know later.

original: Do you still need tea?

original: Wait a minute. The wash is done. I'm going to hang out the laundry to dry.
translated: Deux petites secondes, ma lessive est finie, je vais aller étendre le linge.

original: He was a bookkeeper.

original: It is ten years since I came to live in Shizuoka.

original: He makes good in everything he does.

original: Text me your shopping list.

original: Do the police have any suspects?

original: I have to go.
translated: Je dois y aller.

original: There aren't many trees near my house.
translated: Il n'y a pas beaucoup d'arbres près de ma maison.

original: If peace cannot be maintained with honor, it is no longer peace.
translated: Si la paix ne peut être maintenue sans honneur, ce n’est plus la paix.

original: Faggot!
translated: Pédale !

original: This book isn't very good.
translated: Ce livre n'est pas très bon.

original: I can't afford to buy that this month.
translated: Je ne peux pas me le payer ce mois-ci.

original: Do you have any idea when those pictures might've been taken?

original: Tom is lying on the grass.

original: I don't know how long.

original: Did I tell you that?

original: I hate to eat alone.

original: Do you think it's wise to wear your uniform today?
translated: Penses-tu qu'il soit avisé de porter ton uniforme aujourd'hui ?

original: If you have something to say, say it to my face.
translated: Si vous avez quelque chose à dire, dites-le-moi en face !

original: Orly, Sunday. Parents take their children there to watch the departing planes.
translated: À Orly, le dimanche. Les parents mènent leurs enfants voir les avions en partance.

original: That's how I met your mother.
translated: C'est comme ça que j'ai rencontré votre mère.

original: How does she know that?
translated: Comment sait-elle ça ?

original: How much did they give you for your old car?
translated: Combien vous ont-ils donné de votre vieille voiture ?

original: Tom knew better.

original: Last summer, I spent three weeks in Boston.
translated: L'été dernier, j'ai passé trois semaines à Boston.

original: She wiped her tears away.
translated: Elle essuya ses larmes.

original: Her ashes are interred here.
translated: Ses cendres sont enterrées ici.

original: Who am I? How did I come to be?

original: My plan is not socialist.

original: Tom put the envelope on the table.
translated: Tom posa l'enveloppe sur la table.

original: We discussed our plans for a trip to Italy over coffee.
translated: Nous avons discuté de nos plans pour un voyage en Italie en buvant du café.

original: Make balls 3 centimeters in diameter and place them on a sheet of buttered aluminum foil.
translated: Formez des boules de 3 cm de diamètre et déposez-les sur une feuille de papier d'aluminium beurrée.

original: You've just found him.

original: Please feel free to ask me any question.

original: The Italians always eat spaghetti.

original: If I'd only taken your advice!

original: You look awesome.

original: Don't let them tell you you're crazy.

original: My body is not as supple as it once was.

original: You need a new car.
translated: Il vous faut une nouvelle voiture.

original: They were killed just because they were not whites.
translated: Ils ont été tués simplement parce qu'ils n'étaient pas blancs.

original: You lie.

original: Pierre smiled in silence.
translated: Pierre souriait en silence.

original: He started taking salsa lessons.

original: Beware of imitations.

original: Software programs do not translate as well as I do.

original: It is truly said that time is anger's medicine.

original: Water is indispensable to us.

original: This car is bigger than that one.

original: But his command of the concert repertory and the required technique is astonishing.

original: I will try to fix the thing but I don't promise to do so.

original: Tom will be staying with his cousin over Christmas.
translated: Tom restera chez sa cousine pour Noël.

original: Watch what you're doing.

original: I don't understand why this has to be done.

original: Tom was humiliated.

original: It's because of you that we were late.

original: Bulgarian is similar to Russian.

original: You'll never leave this town.

original: Did you buy them on the black market?

translated: C'est l'un des meilleurs restaurants de la ville.

original: I don't do all that much.

original: The top went around and around.
translated: La toupie tourbillonna encore et encore.

original: Their boat is adrift.

original: Take as many cookies as you want.
translated: Prends autant de biscuits que tu veux.

original: I know that you aren't stupid.

original: They understand one another.

original: She's now older and wiser.

original: I'm out of control.

original: I remember laughing.

original: Who's at home?

original: You will get friends there.

original: I never said I was an artist.

original: Aoi dances well.
translated: Aoi danse bien.

original: Which book did you pick out to send to Anne?
translated: Quel est le livre que tu as choisi pour l'envoyer à Anne ?

original: It was really cheap.
translated: Il était vraiment bon marché.

original: Before going to work in Paris I must freshen up on my French.
translated: Je dois rafraîchir mon français avant d'aller étudier à Paris.

original: Is it a joke?

original: Do you want some sugar in your coffee?

original: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
translated: La vie est l'art de tirer des conclusions complètes à partir d'informations incomplètes.

original: Listen up! Don't be so insolent!
translated: Écoute ! Ne sois pas si insolent !

original: Anybody who feels cold can take another blanket.

original: The house was in sight.

original: He did the work against his will.

original: What do you do on Sunday?

original: Tom avoided making eye contact.

original: Think of something that makes you happy.
translated: Pensez à quelque chose qui vous rend heureuse.

original: He begged me to go with him.
translated: Il me supplia d'y aller avec lui.

original: I interpreted her silence as a refusal.
translated: J'ai interprété son silence comme un refus.

original: Why don't you just ask your parents for money?

original: What does that cost?

original: I don't think that she looks like her mother.
translated: Je ne pense pas qu'elle ressemble à sa mère.

original: Do you read a lot?

original: One more step, and I would have fallen off the cliff.
translated: Un pas de plus, et je serais tombé de la falaise.

original: They say that girls spend more time worrying about how they look than boys do.
translated: On dit que les filles passent plus de temps à se préoccuper de leur apparence que les garçons.

original: I hope you find what you're looking for.
translated: J'espère que vous trouverez ce que vous cherchez.

original: I knew that would interest you.
translated: Je savais que ça t'intéresserait.

original: Where are my hat and my gloves?
translated: Où sont mon chapeau et mes gants ?

original: Blah.
translated: Balivernes.

original: Are you going to come back?
translated: Allez-vous revenir ?

original: Who is this boy?
translated: Qui est ce garçon ?

original: Bill, answer the door.
translated: Bill, ouvre la porte.

original: Who recommended Tom for the position?
translated: Qui a recommandé Tom pour le poste ?

original: After winter came spring.
translated: Après l'hiver vint le printemps.

original: You could count to ten when you were two.
translated: Tu savais compter jusqu'à dix, quand tu avais deux ans.

original: It's hard to believe that it actually happened.
translated: C'est difficile de croire que c'est effectivement arrivé.

original: He is walking.
translated: Il marche.

original: Is Tom fighting?
translated: Est-ce que Tom se bat ?

original: Remember that.
translated: Souvenez-vous-en.

original: The task of establishing Utopia in the galaxy was not pursued without friction. Different kinds of races were apt to have different policies for the galaxy. Though war was by now unthinkable, the sort of strife which we know between individuals or associations within the same state was common. There was, for instance, a constant struggle between the planetary systems that were chiefly interested in the building of Utopia, those that were most concerned to make contact with other galaxies, and those whose main preoccupation was spiritual.
translated: La tâche d'établir l'Utopie dans la galaxie n'a pas été poursuivie sans friction. Différents types de races étaient susceptibles d'avoir des politiques différentes pour la galaxie. Bien que la guerre soit désormais impensable, le genre de conflit que nous connaissons entre des individus ou des associations au sein d'un même État était courant. Il y avait, par exemple, une lutte constante entre les systèmes planétaires qui s'intéressaient principalement à la construction de l'Utopie, ceux qui étaient les plus soucieux d'entrer en contact avec d'autres galaxies, et ceux dont la préoccupation principale était spirituelle.

original: Please contact me later.
translated: Recontacte-moi plus tard, s'il te plaît.

original: I never meant for things to happen the way they did.
translated: Je n'ai jamais voulu que ça se passe comme ça.

original: The furniture belongs to my mother.
translated: Les meubles appartiennent à ma mère.

original: The sky is cloudy today.
translated: Aujourd'hui, le ciel est nuageux.

original: Keep in touch!
translated: Restons en contact !

original: Tom wanted that.

original: Who are you going to send that to?

original: Try not to look so nervous.
translated: Essaie de ne pas avoir l'air si nerveuse !

original: Don't start doing that.

original: I hope you know the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.

original: I am not concerned with this.

original: After one or two large factories have been built in or near a town, people come to find work, and soon an industrial area begins to develop.
translated: Après la construction d'une ou deux grandes usines aux abords ou dans une ville, les gens viennent chercher du travail et bientôt, une zone industrielle commence à se développer.

original: Why do it the hard way?

original: He never fails to write to his mother every month.

original: Tom said that Mary was engaged.

original: Tom wasn't able to sleep on the bus.
translated: Tom n'était pas capable de dormir dans le bus.

original: By freeing thought from its object, Descartes made it possible to view the latter in strictly mechanical terms, reopening the way to science, suffocated for more than fifteen centuries under religious nonsense.
translated: En libérant la pensée de son objet, Descartes a permis de considérer ce dernier en termes exclusivement mécaniques, réouvrant la voie à la science, étouffée depuis plus de quinze siècles sous l'ineptie religieuse.

original: You can't pull it off.
translated: Tu ne peux pas l'arracher.

original: He became a hobo.
translated: Il est devenu vagabond.

original: I felt sad.
translated: J'ai ressenti de la tristesse.

original: Tom wants to say hello.

original: How could you not tell me about this?
translated: Comment as-tu pu ne pas m'en parler ?

original: I called my friend after arriving at the station.
translated: Une fois arrivé à la station, j’ai appelé mon ami.

original: She knew too much.
translated: Elle en savait trop.

original: How many times did you see the movie?
translated: Combien de fois as-tu vu ce film ?

original: I saw it.
translated: Je l'ai vu.

original: I'll trust you.
translated: Je te ferai confiance.

original: I don't like that at all.
translated: Je n'aime pas ça du tout.

original: Where's your mom?
translated: Où est votre mère ?

original: He was a very cultured man, though he wasn't the least bit aware of it.
translated: C'était un homme très cultivé, mais il n'en avait pas du tout conscience.

original: Tom is dressed as Santa.
translated: Tom est habillé en Père Noël.

original: Tom has spent time in Boston.
translated: Tom a passé du temps à Boston.

original: How are you getting along in your new job?
translated: Comment ça va avec ton nouveau travail ?

original: They got into the train.
translated: Elles sont montées dans le train.

original: Have fun! See you in an hour.
translated: Amuse-toi bien ! On se voit dans une heure.

original: Tom was too shy to take part in games with the other boys.
translated: Tom était trop timide pour prendre part aux jeux avec les autres garçons.

original: Doing that will take a long time.
translated: Le faire prendra beaucoup de temps.

original: Sami had breakfast.
translated: Sami prit son petit-déjeuner.

original: Once upon a time lived a king who had three daughters.
translated: Il était une fois un roi qui avait trois filles.

original: Do you really think Tom can swim?
translated: Crois-tu vraiment que Tom sait nager ?

original: Stop nit-picking.
translated: Arrête de chercher la petite bête.

original: I haven't yet eaten anything today.
translated: Je n'ai encore rien mangé aujourd'hui.

original: I swatted a mosquito.
translated: J'ai écrasé un moustique.

original: No smoke without fire.
translated: Pas de fumée sans feu.

original: I don't even want to think about what could happen.
translated: Je ne veux même pas songer à ce qui pourrait se produire.

original: Where is my ticket?
translated: Où est mon billet ?

original: It is my bedroom.
translated: C'est ma chambre à coucher.

original: This style of hat is now in fashion.
translated: Ce style de chapeau est à la mode en ce moment.

original: I want to recover my valuables.
translated: Je veux récupérer mes objets de valeur.

original: Water is liquid. When it freezes, it becomes solid.
translated: L'eau est liquide. Lorsqu'elle gèle, elle devient solide.

original: We look out for each other.
translated: On est soudés.

original: No pets allowed.
translated: Les animaux de compagnie ne sont pas admis.

original: Are you with us, Tom?
translated: Es-tu avec nous, Tom ?

original: I was in all day.
translated: Je suis resté cloîtré toute la journée.

original: Here's one for you.
translated: En voici une pour toi.

original: I'm going to take the 10:30 train.
translated: Je vais prendre le train de 10h30.

original: He's perfect at everything.
translated: Il est parfait en tout.

original: I don't have a cat.
translated: Je n'ai pas de chat.

original: You had better not go.
translated: Mieux vaut ne pas y aller.

original: She hung the calendar on the wall.
translated: Elle accrocha le calendrier au mur.

original: Mary is a jewellery maker.
translated: Mary est fabricante de bijoux.

original: You've got the wrong person.
translated: Tu as serré le mauvais client.

original: I'm happy I can help them.
translated: Je suis heureux, car je peux les aider.

original: All knowledge is not good.
translated: Toute connaissance n'est pas bonne.

original: The street runs along the river.
translated: La route court le long du fleuve.

original: I think you can help us.
translated: Je crois que vous pouvez nous aider.

original: I'm sorry that I didn't email you sooner.
translated: Je suis désolé de ne pas t'avoir envoyé un courriel plus tôt.

original: I'm going there today.
translated: J'y vais aujourd'hui.

original: Give me a drink, please.
translated: Donnez-moi quelque chose à boire, je vous prie !

original: My grandson is still a baby.
translated: Mon petit-fils est encore un bébé.

original: This is a mistake.
translated: Il s'agit d'une erreur.

original: I'm the one who should be doing that.
translated: Je suis celui qui devrait être en train de faire ça.

original: I've never done this kind of thing before.
translated: Je n'ai jamais fait ce genre de choses auparavant.

original: Tom's house was almost completely destroyed.
translated: La maison de Tom a presque été entièrement détruite.

original: Do you know how much it cost me?
translated: Est-ce que tu sais combien ça m'a coûté ?

original: She's not feeling well.
translated: Elle ne se sent pas bien.

original: I think it strange that he didn't speak to you.
translated: Je pense qu'il est étrange qu'il ne vous ait pas parlé.

original: That is your only flaw.
translated: C'est votre seul défaut.

original: I'm going to be there.
translated: Je serai présent.

original: The radio is a bit loud.
translated: Le son de la radio est un peu fort.

original: Betty killed her.
translated: Betty l'a tuée.
